summary.para: The GRADIENT_TRIANGLE structure specifies the index of three vertices in the pVertex array in the GradientFill function. These three vertices form one triangle.

remarks.para: The GRADIENT_TRIANGLE structure specifies the values in the pVertex array that are used when the dwMode parameter of the function is GRADIENT_FILL_TRIANGLE. For related GradientFill structures, see and .
